title.rendered: K+BB Magazine Highlights Eldorado Outdoor Signature Kitchens at KBIS 2014

content.rendered: Official sponsor of the Kitchen and Bath Industry Show (KBIS), Kitchen and Bath Business: K+BB magazine features Eldorado Outdoor Signature Kitchens in the March 2014 issue. Turning heads at the show, Eldorado Outdoor Signature Kitchens allow homeowners to create the ultimate outdoor kitchen by offering a variety of profiles and customization of cabinets, appliances and countertops.
